attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I have ever seen in my life when I downloaded it. It said if I didn’t vote for trump he would take my rights away. That is terrible this is supposed to be a free country
attributes.title: Garbage🤬

attributes.review: This app is poorly made. It feels like someone was Russian to put this app on the market. It’s full of racial ideas and fake news. Definitely avoid if you’re a human being.
attributes.title: Someone was Russian

attributes.review: absolute garbage. hacked all my bluetooth devices and encouraged them to come alive. the robots are now holding me and my family hostage and have demanded that trump be defeated in november if we are to be released. VERY disappointed :((
attributes.title: terrible app 💅

attributes.review:
This has to be the worst app out there!!! 
With so many recourses these days apps should have 0 imperfections, this just doesn’t cut it. I highly suggest this app is just deleted! A true embarrassment.
attributes.title: Just NO.

attributes.review: Oh my if I could give zero stars I would! This app took 3weeks to finish loading and when it finally did all my accounts were hacked!!!
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: This app has so many bugs. Shortly after downloading, my apartment starting flooding with creepy crawlers. I haven’t been able to get rid of them since.
attributes.title: Glitchy App - Ruined My Life

attributes.review: this app is so confusing!! is extremely slow!! and NOTHING makes sense on it!! truly the most complicated and terrible app I have ever used. i recommend you NOT download it 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
attributes.title: worst app ever!!

attributes.review: Ok so like not only do I not like Donald Trump, but this app In total is horrible. If I could give it zero stars I would. Takes forever to download and messes up my phone! 0/10 would never get it again.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR

attributes.review: I downloaded the app looking for fiscally conservative policy. Instead I found racist, sexist, homophobic, and just generally discriminatory messages being spread on a broken, slow, and glitchy platform.
attributes.title: White supremacy

attributes.review: Not only did this app take so long to download, but it gave me viruses.  And it takes up an unreasonable amount of space. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, not only is this app absolutely horrid but so is the administration running it.😌
attributes.title: Terrible
